title: ‘Duh, of course [we] talk to that guy’: Alex Cora discusses Red Sox’ recent track record of ‘interest’ in acquiring players
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: Boston Red Sox “It doesn’t mean that that’s the number one option, but you never know what can happen.
” Red Sox manager Alex Cora doesn’t think it’s a bad thing that the organization talks to a plethora of free agents each winter.
AP Photo/Charles Krupa By Kaley Brown December 26, 2025 | 6:42 PM 3 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: 2 dead in Friday morning crash
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News A third person is in critical condition following the early-morning crash in Barre.
Two people were killed, and a third was critically injured in a single-vehicle crash early Friday morning in Barre, according to local authorities.
The crash occurred at approximately 4:25 a.

title: Revolution trade Tomás Chancalay to Minnesota United FC
author: Hayden Bird
bullets: New England Revolution Chancalay's departure opens up a Designated Player spot on New England's roster heading into the 2026 season.
Tomas Chancalay celebrates a goal with his customary hat-tip during a 2025 Revolution matchup.

Via New England Revolution By Hayden Bird December 26, 2025 | 5:56 PM 1 minute to read The Revolution announced a trade on Friday that will help to reshape the team’s roster under new head coach Marko Mitrović.

title: Milton Williams won’t return for Patriots against Jets, but team gets good news on TreVeyon Henderson
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots The Patriots will also be down six other starters for Sunday's game against the Jets.
TreVeyon Henderson had to leave the Patriots' win against the Ravens early due to a concussion.
(AP Photo/Nick Wass) By Conor Roche December 26, 2025 | 4:23 PM 3 minutes to read The Patriots had a mixed bag of injury news on Friday ahead of Sunday’s game against the Jets.

title: Officials give update on deadly Christmas Eve fire in Needham
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News Investigators believe that the blaze, which killed a 21-year-old woman, was accidental.
Firefighters worked at the scene of a house fire on Woodworth Road in Needham on Wednesday morning.
Natick Fire Department Officials gave an update Friday on the investigation surrounding a deadly Christmas Eve fire that occurred in Needham.

title: MLB insider shares what Red Sox are asking for in a possible Jarren Duran trade
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Boston Red Sox "No team" has reportedly been willing to meet the Red Sox' asking price for Duran in a possible trade.
Jarren Duran has been at the center of trade rumors for much of the offseason.

(AP Photo/Scott Marshall) By Conor Roche December 26, 2025 | 2:20 PM 2 minutes to read Jarren Duran’s name has been at the center of trade rumors all offseason, but the Red Sox are setting a high bar to move him.

title: Wachusett Mountain’s new summit lift opened Friday after delays
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Skiing The Polar Express serves 13 trails and moves about 2,400 people per hour.
Skiers and riders at Wachusett Mountain in Princeton.
Wachusett Mountain By Kristi Palma December 26, 2025 | 1:27 PM 1 minute to read Skiers and riders could finally ride the new summit chairlift at Wachusett Mountain on Friday.

title: Oversight board decertifies former Stoughton deputy chief tied to Sandra Birchmore case
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News Robert Devine used an alias to communicate with Birchmore and met her for a sexual encounter before she died, the commission ruled.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
Former Stoughton deputy police chief Robert Devine had his law enforcement certification revoked by the state’s police oversight board last week.
